Home Repair, Weatherization, & ARPA Program Screening

elements.name: address
elements.title: What is your address?

elements.name: ownHome
elements.title: Do you own your own home?

elements.name: homeType
elements.title: Is it a single, duplex, or other multi-unit?

elements.name: otherProperties
elements.title: Do you own any other properties?

elements.name: nameOnLease
elements.title: Is your name on the deed?

elements.name: taxesUpToDate
elements.title: Are you up to date on your property taxes or on a payment plan?

elements.name: insurance
elements.title: Do you have home owner's insurance?

elements.name: weatherized
elements.title: Have you ever received weatherization or home repair assistance from any of these programs? County Corp, MVCAP, Rebuilding Together Dayton, or Habitat for Humanity?

elements.name: centerpoint
elements.title: Do you have Centerpoint or Vectren as your natural gas provider?

elements.name: income
elements.title: What is your average household monthy income? (Please include all permanent residents over the age of 18)

elements.name: familyMembers
elements.title: How many people in the home?

elements.name: age
elements.title: How old are you?

elements.name: name
elements.title: What is your name?

elements.name: preferredContact
elements.title: What is your preferred form of contact?

elements.title: Email address

elements.title: Phone Number
